title: How Son Of Iran's Ayatollah Khamenei's Advisor Became An Oil Tycoon
content: Hossein Shamkhani, the son of Iran's former national security chief, has emerged as a major player in the global oil market, a Bloomberg report says.
summary: Hossein Shamkhani, the son of Iran's former national security chief, has emerged as a major player in the global oil market, a Bloomberg report says.

title: Lonely Dolphin Terrorises Japan Beach Town With Series Of Attacks: Report
content: A single bottlenose dolphin, who might have been separated from its pod, is being considered responsible for a troubling series of attacks on swimmers in Tsurga, a seaside town in Fukui Prefecture in Japan.
summary: A single bottlenose dolphin, who might have been separated from its pod, is being considered responsible for a troubling series of attacks on swimmers in Tsurga, a seaside town in Fukui Prefecture in Japan.

title: Audi Italy Boss Fabrizio Longo Dies After Falling 10,000 Feet From Mountain
content: Mr Longo, who headed Audi's Italy-based operations, was nearing the summit when the accident occurred.
summary: Mr Longo, who headed Audi's Italy-based operations, was nearing the summit when the accident occurred.

title: Daughter Of South Africa's Ex-President Jacob Zuma Engaged To Eswatini King
content: A daughter of South Africa's former president Jacob Zuma was among hundreds of women and girls who danced for the king of Eswatini in a traditional ceremony Monday, confirming her engagement to the monarch.
summary: A daughter of South Africa's former president Jacob Zuma was among hundreds of women and girls who danced for the king of Eswatini in a traditional ceremony Monday, confirming her engagement to the monarch.

title: Frenchman On Trial For Hiring Strangers To Rape Drugged Wife For 10 Years
content: A French pensioner went on trial Monday on charges of allowing scores of strangers to rape his wife after he drugged her, in a case that has horrified the country.
summary: A French pensioner went on trial Monday on charges of allowing scores of strangers to rape his wife after he drugged her, in a case that has horrified the country.

title: Benjamin Netanyahu Not Doing Enough To Secure Hostages: Joe Biden
content: US President Joe Biden said on Monday he was close to presenting a final proposal for a deal to release hostages held by Hamas in Gaza but said he did not think Israeli Prime Benjamin Netanyahu was doing enough to secure such an agreement.
summary: US President Joe Biden said on Monday he was close to presenting a final proposal for a deal to release hostages held by Hamas in Gaza but said he did not think Israeli Prime Benjamin Netanyahu was doing enough to secure such an agreement.

title: Princess Diana Wanted A Re-Do Of Her Royal Wedding, Here's Why
content: Princess Diana wanted to re-do her royal wedding just so she could "get the hair right," her former hairdresser told People.
summary: Princess Diana wanted to re-do her royal wedding just so she could "get the hair right," her former hairdresser told People.

title: Putin Arrives In Mongolia, Defies World Court's Arrest Warrant
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin was in Mongolia for an official visit on Tuesday, his first to an International Criminal Court (ICC) member since it issued a warrant for his arrest last year.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin was in Mongolia for an official visit on Tuesday, his first to an International Criminal Court (ICC) member since it issued a warrant for his arrest last year.

title: "Shot Them In Back Of The Head": Netanyahu On Hostages Killed By Hamas
content: As thousands of protesters gathered in Tel Aviv on Monday for a second consecutive day of demonstrations criticising the government, Netanyahu sought forgiveness for not being able to save them but also appealed for unity.
summary: As thousands of protesters gathered in Tel Aviv on Monday for a second consecutive day of demonstrations criticising the government, Netanyahu sought forgiveness for not being able to save them but also appealed for unity.

title: RSS Calls For Swift Justice For Women Amid Row Over Kolkata Rape Case
content: A national coordination conclave of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) has condemned the incident of violence against a female doctor in West Bengal, describing it as 'very unfortunate', Sunil Ambekar, RSS Akhil Bharatiya Prachar Pramukh, said.
summary: A national coordination conclave of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) has condemned the incident of violence against a female doctor in West Bengal, describing it as 'very unfortunate', Sunil Ambekar, RSS Akhil Bharatiya Prachar Pramukh, said.

title: Nuke Watchdog Head To Visit Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Plant
content: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Monday that he will meet the head of the international nuclear agency in Kyiv after the official visits the Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant that has been in Russia's hands since early in the war.
summary: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Monday that he will meet the head of the international nuclear agency in Kyiv after the official visits the Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant that has been in Russia's hands since early in the war.

title: Venezuelan Court Issues Arrest Warrant For Nicolas Maduro's Rival
content: Venezuela's attorney general's office on Monday requested an arrest warrant be issued for opposition leader Edmundo Gonzalez, after Gonzalez failed to respond to three summons to testify.
summary: Venezuela's attorney general's office on Monday requested an arrest warrant be issued for opposition leader Edmundo Gonzalez, after Gonzalez failed to respond to three summons to testify.

title: Four Shot Dead On US' Chicago Train: Police
content: At least four people were shot dead on a train in the US city of Chicago on Monday, police said, with a suspect apprehended soon after the mass shooting occurred.
summary: At least four people were shot dead on a train in the US city of Chicago on Monday, police said, with a suspect apprehended soon after the mass shooting occurred.

title: Hostages Will Return "Inside Coffins" If Israel...: Hamas
content: Hamas's armed wing said on Monday that hostages would return to Israel "inside coffins" if military pressure continued, warning that "new instructions" had been given to the militants guarding the captives if Israeli troops approached.
summary: Hamas's armed wing said on Monday that hostages would return to Israel "inside coffins" if military pressure continued, warning that "new instructions" had been given to the militants guarding the captives if Israeli troops approached.

title: Biden, Kamala Harris To Make First Joint Campaign Appearance
content: President Joe Biden and Kamala Harris hit the campaign trail together for the first time Monday, in a public display of unity after she replaced him as candidate and revived Democratic election hopes.
summary: President Joe Biden and Kamala Harris hit the campaign trail together for the first time Monday, in a public display of unity after she replaced him as candidate and revived Democratic election hopes.

title: US Seizes Venezuelan President's Plane Over Violation Of American Sanctions
content: The United States on Monday seized Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro's plane in the Dominican Republic and flew it to Florida, saying it acted over violation of US sanctions.
summary: The United States on Monday seized Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro's plane in the Dominican Republic and flew it to Florida, saying it acted over violation of US sanctions.

title: PM Modi's Historic Visit To Brunei To Bolster Cooperation In Space, Defence
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will become the first-ever Indian PM to visit Brunei when he travels to the country on September 3 and 4 for a bilateral visit. This is being seen as a significant step in bolstering ties between the two nations.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will become the first-ever Indian PM to visit Brunei when he travels to the country on September 3 and 4 for a bilateral visit. This is being seen as a significant step in bolstering ties between the two nations.

title: Brazil Top Court Confirms X Suspension Over Alleged Judicial Transgressions
content: Brazil's Supreme Court on Monday ratified the decision by one of its judges to suspend Elon Musk's X social network for alleged judicial transgressions.
summary: Brazil's Supreme Court on Monday ratified the decision by one of its judges to suspend Elon Musk's X social network for alleged judicial transgressions.

title: In Viral Pak Army Mock Interview, Bizarre 'Katrina Kaif' Question
content: A mock interview for the selection of officers in the Pakistani Army went viral on social media after the interviewer asked a candidate a bizarre question which featured Bollywood actor Katrina Kaif.
summary: A mock interview for the selection of officers in the Pakistani Army went viral on social media after the interviewer asked a candidate a bizarre question which featured Bollywood actor Katrina Kaif.

title: Indian Envoy, Bangladesh Home Adviser Meet, Discuss Security Cooperation
content: Indian High Commissioner Pranay Verma today met interim government's Home and Agriculture Adviser Lt Gen (Retd.) Jahangir Alam Chowdhury and discussed areas of engagement to advance security cooperation and safety of Indian nationals in Bangladesh.
summary: Indian High Commissioner Pranay Verma today met interim government's Home and Agriculture Adviser Lt Gen (Retd.) Jahangir Alam Chowdhury and discussed areas of engagement to advance security cooperation and safety of Indian nationals in Bangladesh.
